interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Fascy Facial Mask Beauty Treatment 5 Packs 3 Step Mask, Korean Facial Skincare Mask, All Natural Moisturizing Facial Mask Skin Beauty Treatment with Eye Cream, Skin Rejuvenation Facial Mask Review Date: 2021/03/24 Store: Fascy Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Fascy', 'Item Form': 'Cream, Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Scent': 'Centella Asiatica', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '7.64 x 4.88 x 0.94 inches; 7.05 Ounces'} Review Text: This packaging is completely in Korean, which is fine, but I wish they included an instruction card for each step. I had to use a translating app to figure out what each pouch was.

The first time I used this product, I used it wrong because I used step 3 first, but that was because there is a big "step 3" on the front of the pouch. My skin felt good after using it the right way, but it's just confusing packaging. The face mask was very difficult to unwrap, which is very frustrating when you are trying to relax with some self care. I don't think I would get these again, but I will use up the rest of the masks that I have. Review Title: A little much Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Magic Wand Makeup Brushes Set - 5pcs Wizard Wand Makeup Brushes Foundation Blending Blush Eyeshadow Face Lip Powder Brush Beauty Tools (New-Bronze) rongji jewelry {'Brand': 'rongji jewelry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'For Eyeshadow, Lip, For Blush, For Setting Powder, For Foundation, Eyebrow', 'Color': 'New-Bronze', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '5', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '7.72 x 3.03 x 1.14 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'makeup brushes', 'UPC': '793610791245', 'Manufacturer': 'YUNXIAN'} WOW! I was so surprised when I took these out of the package. They are very sturdy and look amazing. I wasn't expecting them to be as heavy as they were, but they really are pieces of art. There were a few loose hairs, but once those fell out (as most brushes do), they worked great. The carrying case they came with was also very cute. These are perfect for any Harry Potter fan. I am still so happy with how great these are. Quality! Maya Mari Hydrating Argan Oil Shampoo – Rich in Nutrients, Restores Moisture & Shine, 32 oz MAYA MARI {'Brand': 'MAYA MARI', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged,Curly Hair', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Product Dimensions': '3.25 x 3.25 x 10 inches; 1.94 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'MMAROILSP', 'UPC': '850004068267'} I love the pump that this shampoo comes with. It's great to easily add the product to your hand while showering. This is also a nice big size for the price.

The shampoo is a bit watery, but it does lather very nicely and my hair feels smooth and silky after using it. I feel like I can use this everyday without drying out my hair. The shampoo smells really nice and I love the scent - it's not too strong. I had to use maybe two pumps to fully cover my hair while showering. Love the pump Butterfly Nail Art Decals Water Transfer Stickers, 22 Sheets Butterfly Nail Sticker DIY Nail Decals, 2 Set Butterfly Nail Glitter Holographic Stickers Reflected Butterfly Designs for Nails Supply B bangcool {'Surface Recommendation nail': '', '': 'Unit Count 1.00 Count', 'Shape Irregular': '', 'Brand': 'B bangcool', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.3 x 3.54 x 1.57 inches', 'Theme': 'Butterfly', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Reusability': 'Single Use', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Pattern': 'Insects', 'Product Dimensions': '6.3 x 3.54 x 1.57 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} Overall these stickers are very cute, and they stick on the nail easily. I feel like some of the stickers are very blurry, and it's hard to see what exactly the details are, which is a bit disappointing. The sticker sets also come from different brands, and they have a few different wrappers for each sticker. Very cute, some stickers are "blurry" Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz Bouquet Garni {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'} This body wash is very potent and smells great. The pump is easy to use and my skin feels great after using it. There is also a lot of product in this, so I will be getting a lot of use out of it.

This came arrived and the safety cap was cracked, so it leaked out of the top and was a bit of a mess to clean up. There wasn't too much of product loss, but it still was annoying to clean up. Smells Great! Kneipp Shower Foam Goodbye Stress Water Mint & Rosemary 6.81 Oz Kneipp {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Kneipp', 'Scent': 'Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based', 'Package Dimensions': '8.2 x 2.5 x 2.5 inches; 9.59 Ounces'} I have been enjoying this body foam. The smell isn't too overwhelming, and honestly I could use a bit more smell. It foams up really well, and glides on the skin. You can use not a lot and still cover your entire body. It washes off nicely, and you don't really smell it afterward. I have been using this for about a week and the container hasn't rusted or anything either, which is something that tends to happen with products in a metal container. I wish there was a way to know how much was left, so I know when to get a new one, but overall I am happy with this body wash. Smells Great, Good Foaming invisibobble Sprunchie Spiral Hair Ring - True Black - Scrunchie Stylish Bracelet, Strong Elastic Grip Coil Accessories for Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair invisibobble {'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'invisibobble', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Item Weight': '2 Grams', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '2.83 x 2.8 x 0.87 inches; 0.07 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-SP-HP10001'} I am really impressed with this scrunchie. I have tried to use the invisibobble before, but I have very curly hair and my hair would always get caught in them, even if it did hold my hair up all day. I was so excited to give this a try. It is my new favorite hair accessory. The velvet is very smooth and it grips onto my hair all day. When I take it down, I don't have a very noticeable crease, and it also doesn't tear my hair out. I wish I had 100 of these in every color, I'm now a fan! LOVE THIS Biutee Nail Stamping Plates 5pcs Templates With Stamper Scraper Set Nail Art Plates set animal flower Christmas halloween design Biutee {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.42 x 5.75 x 1.18 inches; 5.47 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'TOOL-AT-755', 'Manufacturer': 'Biutee'} I have tried and tried again for this to work, but I cannot for the life of me figure out how to use this. I have watched videos, tutorials, and spent hours trying these plates to get something, but I can't figure it out. I used different types of nail polishes, waited different amounts of times, and even used a stamper from another set (that also doesn't work) and the nail polish does not go onto the stamper. I feel like I see a lot of videos online of these working, but this is my second set and my second try, and it still does not work for me. Did not work Soo'AE Sweet Pink Bubble Mask, Clarifying & Softening, 1 Count SOOAE {'Brand': 'SOOAE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Softer', 'Scent': 'Peach', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 0.1 x 5.5 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} I was expecting some larger bubbles than this mask gave me. I kept it on a bit longer than the recommended 3 minutes to see if the bubbles would get any larger, but they didn't. I think it worked well, but I think that the gimmick isn't worth what you get. My face felt pretty good afterward, but it wasn't anything special. This may be cooler to a younger demographic, but I would not get this again. Underwhelming Facial Steamer with Portable Mini Cold Facial Mister, Face Steamer for Facial Deep Cleaning, Nano Ionic Face Hot Steaming Machine for Home Facials Personal Moisturizing Skincare Beauty ROSEFEAST {'Material': 'Cotton', 'Brand': 'ROSEFEAST', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Product Benefits': 'Cold,Moisturizing,Relaxing,Clean,Aromatherapy', 'Package Dimensions': '8.31 x 7.87 x 4.57 inches; 1.57 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'ROSEFEAST'} I absolutely love this little facial steamer. It's a great size, and heats up the water very quickly. I also like the tools that this comes with. I feel like the headband is a touch too small for my head, but it is very cute. After using it, my skin felt hydrated, and it really opened up my pores. The reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because I wish the cord was a bit longer and thinner. I have to use an extension cord to use it at my makeup desk. Obsessed Avajar Aqua A-Solution Mask 10 Pack - Hydrating Face Masks for Women and Men| Moisturizing Face Mask | Collagen Face Sheet Masks Set | Korean Face Mask Sheets Pack a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar {'Brand': 'a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Hydrating', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Dimensions': '5.28 x 1.57 x 6.89 inches; 11.99 Ounces'} This mask was easy to open and place on my face. The mask also did not slide while on my face. There weren't a lot of flaps that are hard to manage. My skin felt moisturized after using these, and my skin looked very hydrated. I felt that there was enough product on the mask, and it didn't feel overly wet. I would get these again. Very moisturizing Spiral Hair Ties (Gradient Coffee,9 Pcs), Coil Hair Ties for Thick Hair, Ponytail Holder Hair Ties for Women , No Crease Hair Ties, Phone Cord Hair Ties for all Hair Types with Plastic Spiral QIUTIMIY {'Material': 'Plastic', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'QIUTIMIY', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Number of Pieces': '9'} I have pretty curly hair and I still haven't gotten these to work. My boyfriend uses this in his very straight hair and he has no issues. It holds his hair, doesn't leave a bump, and he likes how they look overall. I wish I could get these to work for my hair, but I do not have any luck. I'm happy that I have someone who can use it and enjoys it, but it's just not a product for me. Not for curly hair Fascy Facial Mask Beauty Treatment 5 Packs 3 Step Mask, Korean Facial Skincare Mask, All Natural Moisturizing Facial Mask Skin Beauty Treatment with Eye Cream, Skin Rejuvenation Facial Mask Fascy {'Brand': 'Fascy', 'Item Form': 'Cream, Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Scent': 'Centella Asiatica', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '7.64 x 4.88 x 0.94 inches; 7.05 Ounces'} This packaging is completely in Korean, which is fine, but I wish they included an instruction card for each step. I had to use a translating app to figure out what each pouch was.

The first time I used this product, I used it wrong because I used step 3 first, but that was because there is a big "step 3" on the front of the pouch. My skin felt good after using it the right way, but it's just confusing packaging. The face mask was very difficult to unwrap, which is very frustrating when you are trying to relax with some self care. I don't think I would get these again, but I will use up the rest of the masks that I have. A little much
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** The user continues to explore makeup tools and artistic designs while expanding their passion for nail art and innovative body care products. Their enthusiasm for pop culture, particularly fantasy themes, remains strong.

- **Product Appreciation:** They have a growing interest in skincare and effective beauty products. Recent interactions reflect a desire for well-structured products, as evidenced by confusion with complex packaging. While they appreciate hydrating skincare solutions, they are increasingly critical of products with difficult application processes or unclear instructions.

- **Quality Expectation:** The user maintains high standards for craftsmanship and performance across all beauty categories. They express dissatisfaction when products fail to meet these expectations, especially regarding hydration and usability.

- **Age Range:** An adult consumer with sophisticated tastes in beauty and personal care tools.

- **Overall Sentiment:** Their discerning approach emphasizes authentic benefits over gimmicks, leading to skepticism towards unproven claims.

- **Details Awareness:** They are meticulous in product selection, valuing reliability and functionality. Their experiences highlight a commitment to finding solutions tailored to their needs, particularly regarding user-friendly designs.

- **Material Preference:** While focused on performance, they appreciate improvements that enhance usability and application ease. Recent frustrations with challenging packaging have reinforced their desire for clearer instructions and simpler design in beauty products.
